title: Ravens take down the Chiefs, Raiders are really 2-0, QB injuries to update and Packers-Lions on MNF!
itunes:title: Ravens take down the Chiefs, Raiders are really 2-0, QB injuries to update and Packers-Lions on MNF!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Cris Carter explain how Lamar Jackson and the Ravens handed Patrick Mahomes his first September loss. Is it time to finally believe in the Raiders after a 2-0 start to the season? Impressive wins by the Cardinals, Cowboys, and Titans....Plus, a MNF preview where the Packers have things to prove against the Lions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
